title: The Power Of Meditation: Beginners Techniques For Higher Levels Of Energy, Focus, And Creativity
description: What if you could greatly reduce the most stressful part of your day? What if you could exchange stress & exhaustion for more time being happy & energetic? Meditation is a tool used to reduce stress and anxiety so that we can focus clearly on our objective without a mind clouded by emotional spirals, cognitive bias’, and egotistical perspectives of ourselves. A growing number of the world’s greatest achievers like Kobe Bryant, Steve Jobs, and Will Smith highly advocate the practice of meditation and many others have said a large portion of their success wouldn’t have been possible without meditation. It’s becoming more and more apparent that meditation is something we can greatly benefit from, especially while living in the modern world. More and more Athletes, Artists, and Celebrities are voicing their support for regular meditation practices and Forrest Neal presents how he’s implemented the practice into his life by using it to support and replace his dependency to prescription stimulants to treat his ADHD! Meditation is an exercise that we can all greatly benefit from and with prestigious Ivy League Universities funding studies on meditation, it’s never been a better time to see how powerful a regular meditation practice can be in your life!
author: Forrest Neal
